xfd2025multimodal.title_en: Multimodal Knowledge Graph–Enhanced Drug–Target Interaction Prediction for Effect-Oriented Drug Discovery
xfd2025multimodal.title_zh: 多模态知识图谱增强的药物-靶标互作预测用于从效应出发的药物发现
xfd2025multimodal.authors_en: Fanding Xu, Jiangang Long, Deyu Meng, Zhiwei Yang
xfd2025multimodal.authors_zh: 徐凡丁，龙建纲，孟德宇，杨志伟
xfd2025multimodal.abs_en: This project integrates atomic-scale structural evidence with network-scale systems knowledge for drug discovery. We develop MolUNet++ to automatically identify task-relevant chemical fragments and quantify their contributions, improving predictive performance and chemical interpretability. We also build UniBioMap by integrating multi-source databases and calibrating/expanding high-confidence relations, enabling synergistic modeling of structural evidence and biomedical knowledge.
xfd2025multimodal.abs_zh: 本项目融合结构与系统两尺度药物发现：提出MolUNet++自动识别关键化学片段并量化贡献，提升预测与可解释性；构建UniBioMap整合多源数据库并校准/扩展高置信关系，支撑结构证据与知识协同建模。
xfd2025multimodal.funding_en: The Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities
xfd2025multimodal.funding_zh: 西安交通大学基本科研业务费

shile2025antiaging.title_en: Research on AI-Based Novel Technologies for Screening and Identifying Anti-Aging Molecules
shile2025antiaging.title_zh: 基于人工智能的新型抗衰老分子筛选与鉴定技术研究
shile2025antiaging.authors_en: Le Shi, Peng Zhao, Sirui Wu, Fanding Xu, Peng Yang, Lizhuo Wang, Yuzhe Xiao
shile2025antiaging.authors_zh: 时乐，赵鹏，武思睿，徐凡丁，杨鹏，王力卓，肖御喆
shile2025antiaging.abs_en: This study targets aldehyde accumulation–driven aging and cardiovascular risk by building an AI–experiment closed-loop pipeline to discover ALDH/ALDH2 agonists. It integrates KGE and GNNs for cold-start, high-throughput virtual screening, and validates hits via chromatography/SPR, cellular and animal aging models, and multi-omics to elucidate mechanisms, enabling wet–dry co-innovation in anti-aging drug discovery.
shile2025antiaging.abs_zh: 本研究围绕醛类累积致衰老与心血管风险，构建AI-实验闭环筛选ALDH/ALDH2激动剂。融合KGE与GNN实现冷启动下高通量虚拟筛选，并以色谱/SPR及细胞动物衰老模型和多组学验证机制，推动AI干湿协同抗衰药物发现。
shile2025antiaging.funding_en: The Frontier Exploration Research Fund of Xi'an Jiaotong University - China Mobile Communications Group Co.,Ltd. Joint Institute
shile2025antiaging.funding_zh: 西安交大-中国移动前沿探索研究项目
